title: someone else is using my account
body:
Hello,
I learned today from a friend that he was seeing me in game playing sona even though I haven't played the game for several weeks.
I already had a problem before of someone sending a spam link to all of my contacts but never someone actually playing from my account.

So the real problem is that I cannont change my password, and the reason is because my old e-mail (the one I created my account with) has been blocked because someone from another country tried to acces it and hotmail has blocked it until I can prove I really own it, and since I cannot remember what other adress I use as a security, it is more or less perma-blocked.

Without acces to my mails I cannot change my password, and cannot stop this person from using my account.
Do you guys have any idea what can be done to secure my account? I really don't want to loose it or get it banned...

Thanks for taking some time to read all this

replies.body: Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) asap and our account team will look into this.  We'll be able to help with recovery as well as updating your information.  In the meantime, go over the[ account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to secure your info outside of league as well.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
Thank you very much for the info!
